module.name: Thorium
module.descr: This unit contains all the stuff Thorium needs to work.

element.name: TThoriumVirtualMachine
element.short: The virtual machine to execute Thorium compiled code.
element.descr: This class will be automatically created by an instance of TThorium as soon as you request a VM. You should not try to create an instance of this yourself.

element.name: TThorium
element.short: The core class of Thorium.
element.descr: This class represents a complete Thorium engine. It manages the bunch of modules and libraries you may want to load and will do its best to support you.

element.name: IThoriumPersistent
element.short: Interface to publish a class to Thorium.
element.descr: Besides TThoriumPersistent this is the second variant to publish a class to Thorium. For a reference implementation of the methods have a look at TThoriumPersistent.

element.name: IThoriumPersistent.FreeReference
element.short: Release a reference.
element.descr: This should decrease an internal counter and, if it reaches zero, free the instance.

element.name: IThoriumPersistent.GetReference
element.short: Get a reference.
element.descr: This should return the object and increase an internal reference counter.

element.name: TThoriumPersistent
element.short: Base class for the easiest possible importing of host classes to Thorium.
element.descr:
You should derive as much as possible classes you want to publish to Thorium from this base class. This class is abstract. You should never create an instance of this class, only of its descendants.
The reference counter is mainly for the Thorium engine. So the complete host environment is counted as one reference. When you do not need the instance anymore, you should release it by one call to FreeReference (not to Free, since there might be more references in the Thorium engine).

element.name: TThoriumPersistent.Create
element.short: Creates a new instance of TThoriumPersistent.
element.descr: You should not call this directly, only using inherited.

element.name: TThoriumPersistent.FreeReference
element.short: Releases a reference of this object.
element.descr: Decreases the internal reference counter of the instance. If it reaches zero, the instance will be freed without asking anymore.

element.name: TThoriumPersistent.FReferences
element.short: The internal reference counter.
element.descr: This counter keeps track of the references of this instance in the Thorium engine stack and registers. When this counter reaches zero, the instance gets freed.

element.name: TThoriumPersistent._AddRef
element.short: Part of IUnknown
element.descr: This links the implementation of IUnknown with the internal reference counter of TThoriumPersistent.

element.name: TThoriumPersistent._AddRef.Result
element.short: The new reference count.

element.name: TThoriumPersistent._Release
element.short: Part of IUnknown
element.descr: This links the implementation of IUnknown with the internal reference counter of TThoriumPersistent. It does the same like FreeReference.

element.name: TThoriumPersistent._Release.Result
element.short: The new reference count.

element.name: TThoriumPersistent.QueryInterface
element.short: Part of IUnknown
element.descr: Interface to the default GetInterface method of TObject.

element.name: TThoriumPersistent.QueryInterface.Result
element.short: Zero on success, E_NOINTERFACE on failure.

element.name: TThoriumPersistent.QueryInterface.IID
element.short: The GUID of the wanted interface.

element.name: TThoriumPersistent.QueryInterface.Obj
element.short: The target where to store the interface reference.

element.name: TThoriumPersistent.GetStaticMethodList
element.short: Callback to load the list of static methods.
element.descr: This will be called by Thorium to determine the list of static methods you want to export. For a detailed example see the customlib sample or the thoriumlib package.

element.name: TThoriumPersistent.GetStaticMethodList.Sender
element.short: The TThoriumRTTIObjectType instance this class will be registered with.

element.name: TThoriumPersistent.GetStaticMethodList.Methods
element.short: An array where you should write your static method references to.

element.name: TThoriumPersistent.GetMethodList
element.short: Callback to load the list of methods.
element.descr: This will be called by Thorium to determine the list of methods you want to export. For a detailed example see the customlib sample or the thoriumlib package.

element.name: TThoriumPersistent.GetMethodList.Sender
element.short: The TThoriumRTTIObjectType instance this class will be registered with.

element.name: TThoriumPersistent.GetMethodList.Methods
element.short: An array where you should write your method references to.

element.name: TThoriumPersistent.GetReference
element.short: Increase the reference counter and return the instance.
element.descr: This will increase the internal reference counter and return the instance itself again.

element.name: TThoriumPersistent.GetReference.Result
element.short: The current instance.

element.name: TThoriumPersistent.GetReferenceCount
element.short: Determine the reference count.
element.descr: This gets the amount of known references to this instance, i.e. the value of the internal counter.

element.name: TThoriumPersistent.GetReferenceCount.Result
element.short: The value of the internal reference counter.

element.name: TThoriumHashableObject.Create
element.short: Internal Thorium class.
